target: Mèsi paske w sipòte abitid bibliyotèk.

source: Families can reinforce expectations at home.
target: Fanmi yo ka ranfòse atant lakay.
Mèsi paske w ranfòse atant yo.
Elèv yo di orevwa avèk respè.
Efò ak pwogrè mete an valè.

source: Families may be invited to events.
target: Fanmi yo ka envite nan evènman.

source: Thank you for a successful school year.
target: Mèsi pou yon ane lekòl reyisi.
Aprantisaj pandan ete ede kenbe konpetans.

source: Reading over the break is encouraged.
Learning can be fun and informal.
Families play a key role in summer learning.
target: Fanmi yo gen wòl kle nan aprantisaj ete.

source: Resources may be shared for support.
Thank you for supporting continued learning.
target: Mèsi paske w sipòte aprantisaj kontinyèl.

source: School staff prepare for the new year.
target: Anplwaye lekòl prepare pou nouvo ane.
Materyèl yo revize epi mete ajou.
Fanmi yo pral resevwa enfòmasyon akey.

source: Questions are welcome before school starts.
target: Kesyon yo byenveni anvan lekòl kòmanse.

source: We look forward to a strong start.
Thank you for partnering with our school.
target: Mèsi paske w patnè ak lekòl nou an.

source: Calm spaces are available when needed.
target: Espas trankil disponib lè sa nesesè.

source: Support is available when challenges arise.
Thank you for supporting student well-being.
target: Mèsi paske w sipòte byennèt elèv.
Elèv yo santi yo an sekirite ak estrikti.

source: Thank you for supporting daily routines.
target: Mèsi paske w sipòte woutin chak jou.

source: School communication aims to be clear.
Messages are shared in plain language.
target: Mesaj yo pataje nan lang senp.
Tanpri li mesaj yo ak atansyon.

source: Student success is our shared goal.
target: Siksè elèv se objektif pataje nou.

source: Students are encouraged to try their best.
target: Elèv yo ankouraje bay pi bon yo.

source: Thank you for supporting student success.
target: Mèsi paske w sipòte siksè elèv.

source: Thank you for your trust and cooperation.
target: Mèsi pou konfyans ak koperasyon ou.

source: We value open and respectful communication.
target: Nou apresye kominikasyon ouvè ak respè.

source: We look forward to continued collaboration.
Thank you for being part of our school community.
target: Mèsi paske w fè pati kominote lekòl la.
Mesaj sa a fini mizajou nou an.

source: Additional information will follow if needed.
target: Lòt enfòmasyon ap vini si sa nesesè.

source: Please keep this message for reference.
target: Tanpri kenbe mesaj sa a pou referans.

source: Do not hesitate to reach out.
We are here to support your family.
target: Nou la pou sipòte fanmi ou.

source: Communication helps us serve you better.
target: Kominikasyon ede nou sèvi ou pi byen.

source: Thank you for your time and attention.
target: Mèsi pou tan ak atansyon ou.

source: Your child is demonstrating steady academic growth.
target: Pitit ou a ap montre pwogrè akademik regilye.
Pwogrè a varye selon matyè yo.

source: Targeted support will address specific gaps.
target: Sipò vize pral adrese mank espesifik yo.

source: Instruction is adjusted based on student data.
target: Ansèyman adapte selon done elèv yo.
Ansèyman ki baze sou done gide planifikasyon leson.

source: We monitor both strengths and challenges.
target: Nou suiv fòs ak defi yo.

source: Academic progress is a shared responsibility.
target: Pwogrè akademik se yon responsablite pataje.

source: Instructional strategies are aligned to standards.
target: Estrateji ansèyman aliyen ak estanda yo.

source: Lessons are designed with clear learning objectives.
target: Leson yo fèt ak objektif aprantisaj klè.

source: Students are expected to demonstrate mastery.
target: Elèv yo atann pou montre metrize.
Ansèyman mete aksan sou panse avanse.

source: Students are challenged at appropriate levels.
target: Elèv yo defi nan nivo apwopriye.

source: Academic rigor is balanced with support.
Intervention services are provided as needed.

target: Ansèyman an ti gwoup vize konpetans espesifik.
Siveyans pwogrè enfòme pwochen etap yo.

source: Interventions are adjusted based on response.
Support is provided within the classroom.
We will communicate progress updates regularly.
target: Nou pral kominike mizajou pwogrè regilyèman.
Nou swiv tandans prezans ak atansyon.

source: Please notify the school of absences promptly.
target: Tanpri fè lekòl la konnen absans rapidman.

source: Instruction begins at the scheduled time.
We value your partnership in attendance matters.
target: Nou apresye patenarya ou sou prezans.
Elèv yo reflechi sou chwa yo.

source: Families are informed of behavior concerns.
target: Fanmi yo enfòme sou pwoblèm konpòtman.

source: We collaborate to support positive growth.
target: Nou kolabore pou sipòte devlopman pozitif.

source: Behavior growth is monitored over time.
Social-emotional learning is embedded in instruction.

target: Elèv yo devlope konpetans konsyans pwòp tèt yo.
Bati relasyon se yon priyorite nan klas.

source: Conflict resolution skills are explicitly taught.

target: Estrateji kontwòl emosyon montre kòm modèl.

source: Families are partners in social-emotional development.
target: Fanmi yo se patnè nan devlopman sosyal-emosyonèl.
Elèv yo pran plis endepandans piti piti.

source: Curriculum design prioritizes depth over speed.
target: Kourikoulòm la bay priyorite pwofondè sou vitès.

source: Home support aligns with classroom goals.
target: Sipò lakay aliyen ak objektif klas.

source: Learning routines can be reinforced at home.
Students are taught responsible technology use.
target: Elèv yo anseye itilizasyon teknoloji responsab.

source: Online assignments align with classroom instruction.
target: Devwa sou entènèt aliyen ak ansèyman klas.

source: Technical issues should be reported promptly.
Screen time is balanced with offline learning.
target: Tan ekran balanse ak aprantisaj san ekran.
Atant klè gide konpòtman sou entènèt.
Fanmi yo sipòte pratik dijital an sekirite.

source: Technology enhances but does not replace instruction.
target: Teknoloji amelyore men pa ranplase ansèyman.
Objektif kout tèm sipòte pwogrè mezirab.

source: Instruction balances immediate needs and future goals.
target: Ansèyman balanse bezwen imedya ak objektif lavni.

source: Students track their own learning progress.
target: Elèv yo swiv pwòp pwogrè aprantisaj yo.

source: Teachers guide students in planning strategies.
target: Pwofesè gide elèv yo nan estrateji planifikasyon.

source: Families may discuss goals at home.
target: Fanmi yo ka diskite objektif lakay.

source: Progress toward goals is reviewed periodically.
Students develop responsibility for their learning.
target: Elèv yo devlope responsablite pou aprantisaj yo.

source: Students are encouraged to ask thoughtful questions.
target: Elèv yo ankouraje poze kesyon reflechi.
Rezònman ki baze sou prèv mete an valè.
Elèv yo soutni agiman ak egzanp.

source: Critical thinking prepares students for future learning.
target: Panse kritik prepare elèv pou aprantisaj lavni.
Kilti klas sipòte pran risk akademik.

source: Mistakes are treated as learning opportunities.
Students are encouraged to persist through challenges.
target: Elèv yo ankouraje pèsiste atravè defi.
Kolaborasyon ant elèv sipòte aprantisaj pwofon.
Travay an gwoup devlope konpetans kominikasyon.
Elèv yo aprann nan plizyè pèspektiv.

source: Collaboration prepares students for future environments.
target: Kolaborasyon prepare elèv pou anviwònman lavni.

source: Lessons allow time for processing information.
target: Leson yo bay tan pou trete enfòmasyon.

source: Complex concepts are revisited as needed.
Instruction balances review and new learning.
target: Ansèyman balanse revizyon ak nouvo aprantisaj.

source: Instructional adjustments respond to student needs.
target: Ajisteman ansèyman reponn a bezwen elèv.

source: Learning pathways may differ among students.
target: Chemen aprantisaj ka diferan ant elèv.

source: All students are held to high expectations.
target: Tout elèv kenbe ak atant wo.

source: Meetings focus on student growth and needs.
target: Reyinyon konsantre sou pwogrè ak bezwen elèv.

source: Action steps may be identified collaboratively.
target: Etap aksyon ka idantifye an kolaborasyon.

source: Thank you for engaging in collaborative planning.
target: Mèsi paske w angaje nan planifikasyon kolaboratif.

source: School policies are designed to support equity.
target: Politik lekòl fèt pou sipòte ekite.

source: Families are informed of policy updates.
target: Fanmi yo enfòme sou mizajou politik.
Politik sipòte anviwònman aprantisaj an sekirite.

source: Consistency builds trust in school systems.
target: Konsistans bati konfyans nan sistèm lekòl.

source: Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
target: Mèsi pou konpreyansyon ak koperasyon ou.
Ansèyman reflete pratik ki respekte kilti.

source: Students see themselves reflected in learning.
target: Elèv yo wè tèt yo reflete nan aprantisaj.
Respè pou idantite mete an valè.
Ansèyman ki respekte kilti sipòte angajman.

source: Transitions between grades are carefully planned.
target: Tranzisyon ant nivo yo planifye ak swen.

source: Students are prepared for increased expectations.
target: Elèv yo prepare pou atant ki ogmante.

source: Information is shared to reduce uncertainty.

target: Elèv yo pratike nouvo woutin piti piti.

source: Support systems remain in place during transitions.
target: Sistèm sipò rete an plas pandan tranzisyon.
Fanmi yo resevwa gid pandan chanjman.

source: Questions are welcomed throughout the process.
target: Kesyon yo byenveni pandan pwosesis la.

source: Transitions are viewed as opportunities for growth.
target: Tranzisyon wè kòm opòtinite pou devlopman.

source: Skills are developed progressively across years.
target: Konpetans devlope pwogresivman atravè ane yo.

source: Instruction builds toward future academic demands.
target: Ansèyman bati pou demand akademik lavni.

source: Students learn to manage increasing responsibility.
target: Elèv yo aprann jere responsablite ki ogmante.
Elèv yo reflechi sou estrateji aprantisaj.
Preparasyon jodi a sipòte siksè demen.

source: Updates are shared as new information emerges.
target: Mizajou pataje lè nouvo enfòmasyon parèt.
Klè ak konsistans gide mesaj yo.

source: Families are encouraged to stay engaged.
Success is built through sustained collaboration.
We remain focused on continuous improvement.
target: Nou rete konsantre sou amelyorasyon kontinyèl.
Adaptabilite sipòte bezwen elèv k ap chanje.

source: Partnership is essential to sustained success.
Thank you for your continued collaboration and trust.
target: Mèsi pou kolaborasyon ak konfyans kontinyèl ou.
